actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs (Subsequently: Energy and Natural Resources)
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs (Subsequently: Energy and Natural Resources).

official_title: A bill to direct the conveyance of certain real property of the United States to the county of Mineral, State of Nevada.

summary.text: Authorizes the conveyance of specified public and acquired lands in the State of Nevada to Mineral County, Nevada, upon payment to the United States of the appraised value of the land. Stipulates that any of the property not purchased within five years will remain in the property of the United States. States that the county shall have six months from the date of notification to purchase the tract.

titles.title: A bill to direct the conveyance of certain real property of the United States to the county of Mineral, State of Nevada.
